Posts.Content: If anyone has had this happen to them, please let me know... Biopsy is positive and now I feel all kinds of aches, pains and headaches. Is my anxiety getting the best of me or could this be mets?
Posts.Title: New diagnosis...so afraid of spread

Posts.Content: I also have DCIS. Can you tell me why they did a mastectomy and not a lumpectomy? Was this a personal choice or recommendation by docs?i am newly diagnosed and very scared. Have appt next week with surgeon.
Posts.Title: New to the forum
